price: 76. Y no habremos sido injustos con ellos, sino que ellos habrán sido injustos consigo mismos.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
